title: Cristian Hîldan
text:
Cristian Hîldan (born 22 September 1973 in <a href="Bucharest">Bucharest</a>) is a former <a href="Romanian%20Rugby%20Federation">Romanian</a> <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> footballer and currently a rugby union coach for his former club, <a href="CS%20Dinamo%20Bucure%C8%99ti%20%28rugby%29">Dinamo București</a>. He was a member of the <a href="Romania%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">national team</a> and also an unused substitute at the <a href="1999%20Rugby%20World%20Cup">1999 Rugby World Cup</a>. He played as a wing.
Personal life.
Cristian is the older brother of the late <a href="C%C4%83t%C4%83lin%20H%C3%AEldan">Cătălin Hîldan</a> who was a professional football player who played for <a href="FC%20Dinamo%20Bucure%C8%99ti">Dinamo</a> and <a href="Romania%20national%20football%20team">Romania national football team</a>.
